AstralHaze.NAME: Astral Haze

ArcaneBarrage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

ArcaneVolley.NAME: Arcane Volley
ArcaneVolley.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

EtherBolt.NAME: Ether Bolt
EtherBolt.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if all other cards in your hand are Ethereal. Deal !D! damage.

FluxBlast.NAME: Flux Blast
FluxBlast.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a Dazed into your draw pile. Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

FluxBolt.NAME: Flux Bolt
FluxBolt.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a Dazed into your draw pile. Deal !D! damage.

EssenceMirror.NAME: Essence Mirror
EssenceMirror.DESCRIPTION: Frail, Weak, and Vulnerable have the opposite effect on you for !M! turn.

EtherBarrier.NAME: Ether Barrier
EtherBarrier.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for every Ethereal card in your hand.

FluxShield.NAME: Flux Shield
FluxShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Shuffle a Dazed into your draw pile.

Hypothesis.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. If it is Ethereal, draw !M! more card.

UmbralWave.NAME: Umbral Wave

VoidBarrier.NAME: Void Barrier

ArcaneTempest.NAME: Arcane Tempest
ArcaneTempest.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Weak and !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

Entropy.NAME: Entropy
Entropy.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Deal !D! damage. Enemy loses !M! Strength.

EssenceDart.NAME: Essence Dart
EssenceDart.DESCRIPTION: Costs !M! less [R] for each Ethereal card in hand. Deal !D! damage.

EssenceShred.NAME: Essence Shred
EssenceShred.DESCRIPTION: Spend all [R]. Deal !D! damage to ALL Weak or Vulnerable enemies X times.

EtherBlast.NAME: Ether Blast
EtherBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each Ethereal card in your hand.

Flare.NAME: Flare
Flare.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! Vulnerable. Shuffle a Dazed into your draw pile.

NebulousBlast.NAME: Nebulous Blast
NebulousBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Shuffle all non-Ethereal cards into your draw pile.

SiphonPower.NAME: Siphon Power
SiphonPower.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! Weak. Gain !M! Strength.

Syzygy.NAME: Syzygy
Syzygy.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. Shuffle a Dazed into your draw pile. Exhaust

ThoughtRaze.NAME: Thought Raze
ThoughtRaze.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Shuffle a card from your hand into your draw pile.

UmbralBolt.NAME: Umbral Bolt
UmbralBolt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If you are Frail, gain [R] and draw !M! card.

Nexus.NAME: Nexus
Nexus.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an attack, gain !B! Block.

PeriaptofCelerity.NAME: Periapt of Celerity
PeriaptofCelerity.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an Ethereal card is Exhausted, gain !M! Dexterity.

PeriaptofPotency.NAME: Periapt of Potency
PeriaptofPotency.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an Ethereal card is Exhausted, gain !M! Strength.

PowerOverwhelming.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain !M! Vulnerable and deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

VoidShackles.NAME: Void Shackles
VoidShackles.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply Vulnerable or Weak to an enemy, apply !M! additional stack.
VoidShackles.UPGRADED_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply Vulnerable or Weak to an enemy, apply !M! additional stacks.

Vortex.NAME: Vortex
Vortex.DESCRIPTION: Enemies who are Vulnerable or Weak cannot gain Block.

Archives.NAME: Archives
Archives.DESCRIPTION: Gain [R] for every !M! cards in your draw pile.

Brainstorm.NAME: Brainstorm
Brainstorm.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle your discard pile and a Dazed into your draw pile. Draw !M! cards.

Brilliance.NAME: Brilliance
Brilliance.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Add your Dexterity as bonus damage to each attack this turn.

Corona.NAME: Corona
Corona.DESCRIPTION: A random Ethereal card in your hand costs 0 this turn.

Equinox.NAME: Equinox
Equinox.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. If you are Frail, gain !M! Strength and !M! Dexterity.

Experiment.NAME: Experiment
Experiment.DESCRIPTION: If an enemy intends to Debuff you, gain !M! Strength and !M! Dexterity.

Flow.NAME: Flow
Flow.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Retain all excess Energy at the end of turn.

Illuminate.NAME: Illuminate
Illuminate.DESCRIPTION: Create !M! copy of an Ethereal card in your hand.
Illuminate.UPGRADED_DESCRIPTION: Create !M! copies of an Ethereal card in your hand.

MindOverMatter.NAME: Mind Over Matter
MindOverMatter.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength for each Frail you have. Remove all Frail.

Shimmer.NAME: Shimmer
Shimmer.DESCRIPTION: Gain [R] [R]. All cards in hand become Ethereal. NL Exhaust.

SiphonMagic.NAME: Siphon Magic
SiphonMagic.DESCRIPTION: Transfer all Artifact from ALL enemies to you. Exhaust.

SiphonSpeed.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Gain !M! Dexterity.

StrokeOfGenius.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Power to your hand. Exhaust.
StrokeOfGenius.UPGRADED_DESCRIPTION: Add a random Power to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. Exhaust.

Transference.NAME: Transference
Transference.DESCRIPTION: Transfer all of your Weak and Vulnerable to an enemy.

Channel.NAME: Channel
Channel.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Discard a card. If it is Ethereal deal !D! damage again.
Channel.UPGRADED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Discard !M! cards. For each card that is Ethereal deal !D! damage again.

Feedback.NAME: Feedback
Feedback.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Weak and Vulnerable from an Enemy. Deal !D! damage per stack removed.

Implosion.NAME: Implosion

MeteorShower.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies for each card in your draw pile. Exhaust

Vacuum.NAME: Vacuum
Vacuum.DESCRIPTION: Remove all of your Weak, Frail, and Vulnerable. Deal !D! damage for each stack removed.

AstralForm.NAME: Astral Form
AstralForm.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw an Ethereal card, deal !D! damage to a random enemy.

Creativity.NAME: Creativity
Creativity.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, shuffle a Dazed into your draw pile, then draw a card.

Enigma.NAME: Enigma
Enigma.DESCRIPTION: Dazed can now be played to gain !B! Block and deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

EventHorizon.NAME: Event Horizon
EventHorizon.DESCRIPTION: Each enemy loses HP equal to the amount of Weak and Vulnerable it has at the start of its turn.

PeriaptofTenacity.NAME: Periapt of Tenacity
PeriaptofTenacity.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! Artifact.

Echo.NAME: Echo
Echo.DESCRIPTION: Play the next Ethereal card twice.

Eclipse.NAME: Eclipse
Eclipse.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Choose an Exhausted Ethereal card and put it in your hand. Exhaust.

Nova.NAME: Nova
Nova.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Stun an enemy. Shuffle !M! Dazed into your draw pile.
Nova.UPGRADED_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Stun ALL enemies. Shuffle !M! Dazed into your draw pile.

ReflectionWard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

Coalescence.NAME: Coalescence
